name: Hop Rope
description:
By Solihah A. and Andrew MP

You play a kid on a school playground playing a fun game called hop rope. Your goal is to hop over the rope before it comes back around so that it doesn't touch you. If it touches you, you get a strike and lose a life. Three strikes and you get detention.

Music:  DaveJf from https://freesound.org/people/DaveJf/sounds/570615/
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
